Klassen
Klasse
Beschreibung
Crypto
The Crypto class provides methods for Caesar cipher encryption and decryption.
FileHandler
The FileHandler class provides methods for managing file operations such as writing to and reading from text files.
Main
The Main class provides the user interface for the program, allowing users to write and read encrypted notes.
